scripts.dev-experimental: npm run compile --workspace=experimental && regolith run dev-experimental
scripts.dev-rc: npm run compile --workspace=rc && regolith run dev-rc
scripts.dev-stable: npm run compile --workspace=stable && regolith run dev-stable
scripts.build-experimental: npm run compile --workspace=experimental && regolith run build-experimental
scripts.build-rc: npm run compile --workspace=rc && regolith run build-rc
scripts.build-stable: npm run compile --workspace=stable && regolith run build-stable
